From: Ramez Zebdie <Ramez.Zebdie@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Friday, October 18, 2024 5:21 PM
Subject: RSO UAE - Store Closure - Swarovski – City Walk - 07th November 24 



Dear All,

 

Please be informed that Swarovski – City Walk will be permanently closed last trading date on 07th November 24 . handover to mall management on 13th Nov.

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Elisabetta Pascale <mailto:Elisabetta.Pascale@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 09th Nov before trading hours by/ Service request please to be raised @Rizaldy Amada <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  @Ali Zeb Siyal <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com>  @Real Emirates - IT <mailto:RealEmirates-IT@chalhoub.com> 

*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different one on 07th Nov at the EOD @Elisabetta Pascale <mailto:Elisabetta.Pascale@chalhoub.com> 
*	Collection of merchandise transfer and loose furniture on 09th Nov before trading hours  @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net> 
*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 08th Nov 2024 / Ensure cancel of the Cash Collection Service Agreement @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  
*	Please Arrange Sefa team to dismantle the NVR and CCTV on 09th Nov @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  
*	To request for stock collection and non-Stock ASN appointment from one reach @Mohammed Meraj <mailto:Mohammed.Khan@chalhoub.com>  @Yusuf Arikady <mailto:Yusuf.Arikady@chalhoub.com> 
*	Create/ actioned the RTW in system to be reflected in SIOCS before 08th Nov 2024 @Mohammed Meraj <mailto:Mohammed.Khan@chalhoub.com>  @Yusuf Arikady <mailto:Yusuf.Arikady@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Real Emirates - IT Retails <mailto:RealEmirates-ITRetails@chalhoub.com>  @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation to store email to apply for permits.

chunks.text:
@chalhoub.com>; Philip Abdou <Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>; Benedicte Blanc <Benedicte.Blanc@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - Store Closure - Swarovski – City Walk - 07th November 24 
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that Swarovski – City Walk will be permanently closed last trading date on 07th November 24 . handover to mall management on 13th Nov.

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Elisabetta Pascale <mailto:Elisabetta.Pascale@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 09th Nov before trading hours by/ Service request please to be raised @Rizaldy Amada <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  @Ali Zeb Siyal <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com>  @Real Emirates - IT <mailto:RealEmirates-IT@chalhoub.com> 

*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different one on 07th Nov at the EOD @Elisabetta Pascale <mailto:Elisabetta.Pascale@chalhoub.com> 
*	Collection of merchandise transfer and loose furniture on 09th Nov before trading hours  @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net> 
*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 08th Nov 2024 / Ensure cancel of the Cash Collection Service Agreement @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  
*	Please Arrange Sefa team to dismantle the NVR and CCTV on 09th Nov @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  
*	To request for stock collection and non-Stock ASN appointment from one reach @Mohammed Meraj <mailto:Mohammed.Khan@chalhoub.com>  @Yusuf Arikady <mailto:Yusuf.Arikady@chalhoub.com> 
*	Create/ actioned the RTW in system to be reflected in SIOCS before 08th Nov 2024 @Mohammed Meraj <mailto:Mohammed.Khan@chalhoub.com>  @Yusuf Arikady <mailto:Yusuf.Arikady@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Real Emirates - IT Retails <mailto:RealEmirates-ITRetails@chalhoub.com>  @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net>  @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation to store email to apply for permits.

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to contact me.

 

Best Regards,

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

DUBAI
